definition: younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: During the teaching force of the subtleties will be passed to students, respected by the disciples.
sentences.chinese: 教学期间将武之奥妙之处传给师生，受到弟子尊敬。

sentences.english: The eldest Kasyapa's disciples were in rags and practiced a Dhuta practice.
sentences.chinese: 大伽叶的弟子衣衫褴褛，他们修的是头陀行。

sentences.english: As Fan ChunRen's disciple, he was influenced deeply.
sentences.chinese: 作为范纯仁的弟子，又深受其影响。

sentences.english: "Come, let's enter inside", the yogi said to his disciple.
sentences.chinese: “来吧，我们一起进去”，修行者对他的弟子说。

sentences.english: Yesterday disciple Jing Xing asked me to compose a dedication for his version of the Green Tara Sadhana .
sentences.chinese: 昨天弟子敬行请我为他的绿度母仪轨版本写篇回向文。

sentences.english: Yue not the cluster to kill all the teach disciple.
sentences.chinese: 岳不群杀了所有魔教弟子。

sentences.english: As requested by disciple Xin Ping I had written the new poem in calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 应弟子心平之提请，我已写了新诗之翰墨。

sentences.english: Kunlunfaction will let us do the small disciple?
sentences.chinese: 昆仑派会不会放过我们这些小弟子呢？

sentences.english: So I told her that Disciple Stanley would be the suitable person to do it.
sentences.chinese: 因此我告诉她弟子成穗是译此文的合适人选。

sentences.english: The refuge in the buddhist or says buddhists.
sentences.chinese: 皈依三宝的人是佛教徒或称佛弟子。

sentences.english: And I have got swimmers that do swim with their thumbs out.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个弟子，游泳时还真的把拇指向外伸。

sentences.english: As requested by a disciple one poem is written in calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 应一弟子提请，一诗作已手书成。

sentences.english: "Red" pious, boasts many followers of the "nine" music.
sentences.chinese: “说书红”弟子很多，号称有“高门九英”之说。

sentences.english: A Village disciples said to be the first one black-faced farmer, as he on the go.
sentences.chinese: 一弟子说是村东头一个黑脸的农民，因为他忙个不停。

sentences.english: There are several types of rabbits and each has their own whacked -out characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 有几种类型的家兔和每个都有自己的弟子出特色。

definition: used for 師傅|师傅 (in Taiwan)/master/qualified worker
senior male fellow student or apprentice/son (older than oneself) of one's teacher
founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
young disciple (of the same master)/younger or junior male schoolmate
handed down in a direct line from the founder
great scholar respected for learning and integrity
elder/term of respect for a Buddhist monk
to keep the law/to protect Buddha's teachings/protector of Buddhist law (i.e. temple donor)
